title: Chapter VII - Real Property Acquisition
content:
Chapter VII - Real Property Acquisition

State Regulations

Part 400 - Payments To An Owner Or Tenant Of Residential Property Or Commercial Property Upon Their Application For Allowance Of Moving Expenses In Vacating Property Acquired By The Commissioner Of Correctional Services For Supplemental Relocation Payments, For Loss Of Favorable Mortgage Financing And For Closing Costs (ยง 400.1 to 400.12)

Part 401 - Repealed

Part 402 - Repealed

Part 403 - Repealed

Part 404 - Repealed

Part 410 - Payment Of Costs For Prosecution Of Inmates (ยง 410.1 to 410.7)

Part 513 - Limits On Administrative Expenses And Executive Compensation (Repealed) (ยง 513.1 to 513.8)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
